/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.product.repository.master.BdProductReviewImageDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE BD_PRODUCT_REVIEW_IMAGE
prdt_rvw_seq = #{prdtRvwSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
image_seq = #{imageSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
image_name = #{imageName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_path_text = #{imagePathText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WHERE image_seq = #{imageSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND prdt_rvw_seq = #{prdtRvwSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER}
